dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3716 IH: Small-business Procurement Utilization Reform Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse (for himself and Ms. Salazar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase the governmentwide goal for the percentage of procurement contracts awarded to small business concerns, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small-business Procurement Utilization Reform Act or the SPUR Act.

section.header: Increase governmentwide small business procurement contract goal

subsection.text: Section 15(g)(1)(A)(i) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 644(g)(1)(A)(i)) is amended by striking 23 and inserting 25.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on October 1, 2023.
